channel.title: Java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, SET VARBILES!
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape, Im Tryying To Setup My Runescape PS, On My VPS.
Sadly Thou..... When I Complie Its All Fine,
As A Heads Up Ive Set Everything (My Enviroment Variables, Even Tryed Tuts For Fixing This Error) But Yet, I Still Fail To Get Rid Of
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or bath file. press any key to continue...'[/code]
Now Dont Say OMG, Noob, I Know C++ Ect, So Im Not A Noob Im Just Tryying To Figure Out This And Im Not The Greatest In Batch.
My Run Code Is
[code]@echo off color 0a title ReapageScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
Now, Thats To Run My Server 'RunServer.bat' Im Using SplitSoul's Source.
And When I Try Run Client I Get To It, And It Says
Connection Retrying In .....%s (Seconds).
Im Not Sure If This Will Confilict With Server Being Offline Or What Not, I Have My DUC-IP Up Ect.
Set All Variables. Eh?
Helpz0r's?

item.title: Java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, SET VARBILES!
item.dc:creator: @Envy1337 Envy1337
item.description:
@Envy1337 wrote:

Hello Moparscape, Im Tryying To Setup My Runescape PS, On My VPS.

Sadly Thou… When I Complie Its All Fine,

As A Heads Up Ive Set Everything (My Enviroment Variables, Even Tryed Tuts For Fixing This Error)
But Yet, I Still Fail To Get Rid Of

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or bath file. press any key to continue...'

Now Dont Say OMG, Noob, I Know C++ Ect, So Im Not A Noob Im Just Tryying To Figure Out This And Im Not The Greatest In Batch.

My Run Code Is

@echo off color 0a title ReapageScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause

Now, Thats To Run My Server ‘RunServer.bat’ Im Using SplitSoul’s Source.

And When I Try Run Client I Get To It, And It Says

Connection Retrying In …%s (Seconds).

Im Not Sure If This Will Confilict With Server Being Offline Or What Not, I Have My DUC-IP Up Ect.

Set All Variables. Eh?

Helpz0r’s?

Read full topic
item.source: Java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, SET VARBILES!
